column5: Two and a half men would be in the top three. And yours .....  Lip Gloss   Erectile Dysfunction   Women Are Like Cupcakes   Charlie Drunk http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lnn7Ex1gB0U
Yep...2 episodes back to back on KTLA @ 10:00 PM every night...  Great show...

I thought of that show on Saturday night driving home from the ponies. Just like Charlie's brother...when the bill was coming for dinner I got up and went to bet on the last race...sticking Dano with the bill! Wasn't intentional...just the way it happened! Oh well... he won the tri-factor IN THE 9th, 10th and 11th races! What's the chance of that? If he had of bet a $100 on each race tri-factor he would have went home with 28 grand... not $280! LOL
LOL the best one ive seen is the one with charlie waffles and i love the theme song very catchy http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k_OWPWBjgoo  theme song

It's a good TV show, the kid does grab the centre of attention whenever he speaks. In my opinion he makes the show. Charlie has the same attitude to life as my late brother had. Now only if my brother had Charlie's money and lived on Malibu...  I still like Corner Gas and it tops my list for favourite current TV shows.
2.5 men is pretty good, i've only seen it a few times.  I prefer The Office! Although, it seems the only show I ever watch now is Family Guy, it must be on 10 time a day!
Everything I know, I learned from "The Simpsons".    Pretty much the only thing I watch on tv anymore.  I get all my laughs and entertainment right here!
